channel.title: Int npcID; [UPDATED] Please bump this
channel.description: I am trying to add combat, what i need help with: 1.Hit bar. 2.Npc death emote, help. How to make the npc do an emote?

item.title: Int npcID; [UPDATED] Please bump this
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

I dont have the class NPCHandler and now i updated this to: how can i make an npc do emote?
Edit: Ahh now i see i didn’t meant to write hit splats i wanted to write HIT BARS, can you help me with them (i need them for the playervsmonster, playervsplayer already have them)
And its 508.

Read full topic

item.title: Int npcID; [UPDATED] Please bump this
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

create a switch-statement for death emotes then call it in the NPCHandler process method -.-
it doesn’t have to be a switch-statement, preferably something OOP; functional, read-able and not memory consuming.

as for the hitmarks you’ll have to create a new method and write bytes to the client. then put this in the player update block

Read full topic
